front.title: Network-Based Call Signaling (NCS) Signaling MIB for PacketCable and IPCablecom Multimedia Terminal Adapters (MTAs)

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it provides a common data and format representation for PacketCable and IPCablecom compliant Multimedia Terminal Adapter devices. This memo specifies a MIB module in a manner that is compliant to the SNMP SMIv2. The set of objects are consistent with the SNMP framework and existing SNMP standards.
